Description.Text:
Hotel Playa Esperanza is located on the seafront of Playa de Muro beach, an oasis of peace and quiet in a privileged spot on the Mediterranean coast.
This hotel, the flagship of Esperanza Hoteles, stands between Apartments Playa Esperanza and Aparthotel Esperanza Park, surrounded by 60.000 sqm. of gardens, separated from the beach just by sand dunnes.
It has 332 rooms in all including 29 single rooms and 303 double rooms.
The Wellness & Spa Playa Esperanza, with a 700 sqm. surface invites you to a world of pleasure. It consists of the thermal & wellness area with hydromassage whirlpool, Jacuzzi, sauna steam bath thermal bath pediluvium and biothermal shower, also a wide variety of new relaxing & beauty therapies, good for the Body, Mind and Soul.
Our resort offers a wide range of facilities, 4 pools, one of them indoor pool, two restaurants Snack-Bar, Lounge bar with terrace and nightlife, mini-club and nursery, two playgrounds, tennis court, paddle tennis court, two beach volleyball courts, sailing school and bicycle shed.
Is located on the seafront of playa de muro beach: an oasis of peace and quiet in a privileged spot on the mediterranean coast.

STANDARD - DOUBLE ROOM - 2 single beds, A mini-bar, Satellite TV, Air-conditioning, A direct dial telephone, A safety deposit box (for an additional charge), A fully-fitted bathroom with a hairdryer, A terrace.
STANDARD - SINGLE ROOM - 1 single bed, A mini-bar, Satellite TV, Air-conditioning, A direct dial telephone, A safety deposit box (for an additional charge), A fully-fitted bathroom with a hairdryer, A terrace.
